name: Cooking Story-Food Restaurant
description:
Enjoy a delicious journey around the world! "Cooking Story" is now available. Welcome this latest 2019 simulation cooking game!
You can't miss this game if you like cooking! All the recipes in the game come from the real production process, ensuring you harvest new cooking knowledge!
If you don't like cooking, you can't miss this game! The new and unique gameplay will open the door for you, and you will be addicted to it!
New restaurants and recipes are constantly being developed, and we promise you to enjoy the feast of food!

【Gameplay】
We provide you with a very simple and easy gameplay, you only need to:
Make food in order according to customer's order and recipe
After the food is cooked, take out them and deliver to the customer in time.
Pay attention to customer patience, manage your time, and arrange the order of production and delivery
Don't fool customers with burnt food, or you will get their bad reviews.
Your income will become a fund for upgrading kitchenware and ingredients.
Advanced kitchenware can bring faster and more output
Fresh and excellent ingredients will earn you more word of mouth and profit

[Game Features]
High bonuses with combo
Upgrade kitchen utensils and ingredients to speed up output and increase profits
Rich props help you complete your level goals more easily
Open a birthday party and win a lot of props and diamonds for free
Enjoy unparalleled fun anywhere, anytime, without networking

What are you waiting for, download the "Cooking Story" and open your own food tour!
